sourcesContent: import { Box, Card, CardContent, CircularProgress, Typography, List, ListItem, Grid, Avatar } from '@material-ui/core' import React from 'react' import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; export default function UsersComponent(props) { const { gitUsers, loading, errorMessage } = props; console.log(gitUsers) return ( Git User Info Search Result {!gitUsers.login === '' ? {gitUsers.login && (`Your search for ${gitUsers.login} was found`)} : (No user was found)} { loading && ()} {errorMessage && ({errorMessage} couldn't fetch data)} {gitUsers && ( <> Name: {" "}{gitUsers.name} Username: {" "}{gitUsers.location} UserId: {" "}{gitUsers.name} Location: {" "}{gitUsers.location} Blog: {" "}{gitUsers.blog ? gitUsers.blog : 'No Blog' } Public Repos: {" "}{gitUsers.public_repos } Followers: {" "}{gitUsers.followers ? gitUsers.followers : 'None'} Following: {" "}{gitUsers.following ? gitUsers.following : 'None' } Avatar: {" "} Bio: {" "}{gitUsers.bio} Company: {" "}{gitUsers.company ? gitUsers.company : 'None at the moment'} Visit Git Profile: {" "}{gitUsers.url} )} ) }
